rules.name: SPEN_Any2NumbersAreSame
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 4) OR (1 AND 3 AND 5) OR (2 AND 3 AND 6)
rules.label: Any 2 Numbers Are Same

loops.name: SPEN_loopforalltheContactPremise
loops.label: loop for all the Contact Premise

fields.name: TextMessageforNumber
fields.fieldText: Duplicate phone number. Click "Previous" and remove duplicate phone number.

fields.name: SPEN_RoleValidation
fields.fieldText: There is a contact premise record with the same role. Click "Previous" and amend the role.

fields.name: SPEN_DisplayFaultAccountCreation
fields.fieldText:
It seems there's an issue preventing the creation of a Account. Please review the error message below for details. If you require more information, please contact your administrator with the provided message:


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: SPEN_SurveyOptOut
fields.helpText: Tick if customer does not wish to receive Salesforce Surveys (GE/LCT only)

fields.name: SPEN_DisplayFaultErrorCP
fields.fieldText:
It seems there's an issue preventing the creation of a Contact Premise. Please review the error message below for details. If you require more information, please contact your administrator with the provided message:


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: SPEN_DisplayFaultPathMessage

It seems there's an issue preventing the creation of a contact. Please review the error message below for details. If you require more information, please contact your administrator with the provided message:
